name: Dimenzion
description:
Dimenzion is a prototype color puzzle platformer made for Friday Night Game Jam - #2020-37. You play as a mage trapped in a new dimension, to espace he must transfrom himself using potions in order to enter the many doors keeping him trapped. 

The jams theme was a color challenge, only these colors were used (+black and white)

This is a prototype! There is only one small level, once completed you start over.

Art inspired by 0x72's work
